links.name: Aave
links.description: A decentralized lending platform that allows users to earn interest on deposits and borrow assets.

links.name: Compound
links.description: A decentralized lending and borrowing platform that allows users to earn interest on deposits and borrow assets.

links.name: MakerDAO
links.description: A decentralized lending platform that allows users to create and borrow the stablecoin DAI, backed by collateral.

links.name: Yearn Finance
links.description: An aggregator of yield farming strategies that automatically moves funds to the highest yield farming opportunities.

links.name: Synthetix
links.description: A decentralized synthetic asset issuance platform that allows users to gain exposure to real-world assets and currencies.

links.name: Harvest Finance
links.description: An automated yield farming aggregator that allows users to automatically switch between the highest-yielding opportunities.
